H3.text: Think a big animal and fill in the two missing blanks. ___, ___, Indian, Javan, Sumatran. White and black (species of rhinoceros)

A4.text: The white rhinoceros, also known as the white rhino or square-lipped rhinoceros (Ceratotherium simum), is the largest extant species of rhinoceros.

A5.text: Geraads argued that the type specimen of C. praecox exhibits closer affinities with the black rhinoceros (Diceros bicornis) and should therefore be classified as Diceros praecox.
